name: Desert Chicha
description:
So for how to play the game :

Controllers are : 

a : move left 

d : move right 

space : jump 

left mouse btn : fire weapon 

Objective : collect the 3 part of the "Chicha" and don't die you are the last of your kind .

I added the installing executable to the project . Download it ,run it , the game will start automatically and you're good to go this is only a demo so there is only 1 level.
